alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Palos Verdes Hills; Ventura County Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 1:56AM PST until January 04 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands, Palos Verdes Hills, and the beaches in Ventura and Los Angeles Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Palos Verdes Hills; Ventura County Beaches
